title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin goes on a campaign for Giannis Antetokounmpo as the league's MVP and what separates him from other young stars in the NBA right now. He supports the Colts and their approach to addressing their quarterback issues and why other NFL teams should be doing the same. Despite their awful season, he provides some good news for the Lakers after another disappointing loss. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First joins the show to explain why the Nets don't have a chance in the Eastern Conference playoffs this season. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
